response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for me. This unique item is not just a possession but a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. Given its significance, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $750,000. Your acceptance would not only secure a remarkable addition to your collection but also support the continuation of our shared appreciation for quality and excellence. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can discuss the details further.", "product_price": 750000}
